mapper.select:
select oi.id, oi.code, oi.user_id, oi.merchant_id, oi.order_price, oi.after_order_price, oi.discount, oi.integral, oi.status, oi.`type`, oi.kilometre, oi.distribution_price, oi.create_date, oi.service_date, oi.address_id, oi.staff_id, ui.name as userName, ui.images as userImages, mi.name as merchantName, mi.images as merchantImages from order_info oi left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) left join merchant_info mi on (mi.id = oi.merchant_id) where 1 = 1
AND oi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.code},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.userName},'%')
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.merchantName},'%')
order by oi.create_date desc
